title: Blackstone River Valley National Heritage Corridor: Field Trips
body: Field Trips       If you are looking for a field trip opportunity for your class to experience the resources of the Blackstone River Valley, please call (401) 762-0250 and ask to speak to one of the Rangers. Or you can e-mail us for more information. Currently, the availability of National Park Service Rangers for field trips and classroom visits is limited, but we will work with you to try to find open dates, as well as put you in touch with partner sites that offer on-site visits.     Results  There are no results to show.
